description: Bipin Gemani, a former chief financial officer of IDFC Bank, has been appointed as the company’s CFO and whole-time director with immediate effect till September 2024.

title: ‘IDFC Bank looks to raise ₹20 billion in fiscal 2024’
description: IDFC First Bank has board approval to raise ₹40 billion. It has already raised close to half that amount through a preferential allotment to IDFC Ltd.

title: IDFC First Enters Elite Club of Top 10 Most-Valued Listed Banks in India - News18
description: The bullish trading in the IDFC Bank stock stems from the impending merger with IDFC and its entry into the MSCI Global Standard Index
